name: Gravital
description:
Gravital is a short gravity-based puzzle game, with 10 levels in which you change the gravity of some objects - sometimes your own - to escape from futuristic rooms. Made as a month-long school project in Unity, using free assets, listed below. Assets that aren't in the list, such as gravity cannon, levers, animations, code, etc., were made by the Gravital Team.

Default controls (mouse required):
 -  ZQSD/WASD to move
 - A/Q to grab
 - E to interact
 - left click to fire
 - right click to reverse the gravity axis
 - mouse wheel scroll to change the axis
 - ESC for pause

Free assets used:
 - in-game musics by Coma-Media : Abstract Science, Atmospheric Technology, Futuristic Timelapse & Science Ambient Music
 - main menu music by REDproductions : Synthwave Vintage Future Synth 80s Retro Game Futuristic Music
 - SFX from the following websites: FreeSound, PlayOnLoop and FreeSFX, whith some depending on the Creative Commons 4.0 licence
 - room and environment models from the 3D Scifi Kit Starter Kit by CreepyCat

How fast can you finish the game? Try to keep your bullet count low...

Comments and remarks appreciated, development might be picked up again one day... 😉
